## Public Member Functions

### getByteSize() {#a50a3d3171e9bba6ee3e3bcfc8db2af31}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; int64&#95;t &gt; DWARFAbbreviationDeclaration::AttributeSpec::getByteSize (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> &amp; U) const</>}>
Get the fixed byte size of this Form if possible.

This function might use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> to calculate the size of the Form, like for DW&#95;AT&#95;address and DW&#95;AT&#95;ref&#95;addr, so this isn&#39;t just an accessor for the ByteSize member.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfabbreviationdeclaration-h/#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfabbreviationdeclaration-h">DWARFAbbreviationDeclaration.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfabbreviationdeclaration-cpp/#l00233">233</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfabbreviationdeclaration-cpp">DWARFAbbreviationDeclaration.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
